meanings.definition: A single item on an agenda.
meanings.sent1: The teacher's agendum for today's meeting is to discuss the upcoming field trip.
meanings.sent2: Let's review the agendum for the meeting to make sure we cover all the important topics.
meanings.sent3: The agendum to bring snacks to the party was met with enthusiasm by all the guests.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the agendum that brightened up the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The agendum to clean up the park was a call to action for the community.

meanings.definition: A list or schedule of items to be discussed or acted upon.
meanings.sent1: The agendum for the conference includes presentations from various experts in the field.
meanings.sent2: Please send me the agendum for the project meeting so I can prepare accordingly.
meanings.sent3: The agendum to watch a movie instead of studying was quickly vetoed by the group.
meanings.sent4: The agendum of life is filled with unexpected twists and turns.
meanings.sent5: The agendum of the team was clear: to win the championship at all costs.
